"Forest Therapy": A unique form of therapy where patients are taken into the woods and guided by walking trees to help with mental health and well-being.
"Arbor Day Walks": A community event where trees lead participants on a walking tour of the city, highlighting the importance of urban green spaces.
"Tree Trekking Adventures": A company offering high ropes courses and team-building activities for groups, with the added challenge of navigating through the forest with walking trees.
"Tree Yoga": A new form of yoga where participants practice poses with the help of walking trees, promoting balance and harmony with nature.
"The Great Tree Migration": A social movement where trees in urban areas migrate to more sustainable locations, leading to changes in city planning and development.
